attributes.action: Consider debates from online petitions outside the parliament website
attributes.additional_details: The people need to be heard. There’s absolutely no reason at all why petitions such as Shukri Abdi with nearly a million signatures, shouldn’t be debated in parliament due to it not being on this website!!! ridiculous!!! THE TORY PARTY IS BASED ON NO CHANGE AND UPHOLDING TRADITION.
attributes.background:
The government won’t consider petitions from sites such as change.org. 
At the moment, there is a massive movement going on for social change, the black lives matter movement has been using petition websites to try and make change. But it won’t be considered because it’s not on this exact website?
